member.name: T:Assign_3.QueryClass
member.summary: A class library consisting of various functions which execute SQL queries and return certain values

member.name: M:Assign_3.QueryClass.CountRows
member.summary: A function which establishes a connection to the database and executes SELECT query on the default 'randData' table
member.returns: Returns result from executed SQL query

member.name: M:Assign_3.QueryClass.CountRows_Indexed
member.summary: A function which establishes a connection to the database and executes SELECT query on the indexed 'randData_Indexed' table
member.returns: Returns result from executed SQL query

member.name: M:Assign_3.QueryClass.CountSelectRows
member.summary: A function which establishes a connection to the database and executes SELECT-WHERE query on the default 'randData' table
member.returns: Returns result from executed SQL query

member.name: M:Assign_3.QueryClass.CountSelectRows_Indexed
member.summary: A function which establishes a connection to the database and executes SELECT-WHERE query on the indexed 'randData_Indexed' table
member.returns: Returns result from executed SQL query
